Miscellaneous Highlights: The Indian team will play a minimum of 43 matches- 14 T20Is, 23 ODIs and 6 Tests in the year 2023.
The 2023 ICC Cricket World Cup will occur in the subcontinent from 26 October to 26 November.
Others: The Indian team will tour the West Indies in July and August, playing 2 Test matches, 3 ODIs and 3 T20Is.
The Asia Cup will be held in the 50-over format in September 2023.
